subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: PLAYER In England, Chelsea goalkeeper Petr Cech returned to training this week for the first time since sustaining a fractured skull in a game in October. “I am not saying he will play, but Cech is ready,” Manager José Mourinho said, referring to Saturday’s match at Liverpool. “The best goalkeeper in the world is ready to play. After three months, he is ready.” Cech will need to wear a helmet during games for the next three years.
